style="color:#ff5460">Fork </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">in </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c8b4f0">Being's </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7864ff">Road </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span style="color:#ff607c">pace </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">took </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0d4a0">sudden </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff5460">Forest </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c8b4f0">Retreat </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">was </xhtml:span><xhtml:span document.title: Our journey had advanced
